For this reason, they do not hold the Fairy Tail Guild, mainly Natsu Dragneel, in high regard due to their idiocy and property damaging tactics. Due to the events of the Tower of Heaven arc, where two members were revealed to as traitors, several Council members have left. They have since been replaced as of the Oración Seis arc. The Council has nine members at a time, along with a chairman that makes the final decisions.

character.name: Michello
character.description: Michello is former member of Magic Council, where he had occupied the third seat.

character.name: Belno
character.description: An elder female.

character.name: Leiji
character.description: A senior member whose granddaughter was seduced by Loke.

character.name: Lamia Scale
character.description: Lamia Scale is one of the top four guilds in Fiore and includes the powerful wizard saint Jura. In the recent past some of the guild members left to aid Lyon in killing Deliora. The departed members have since returned, bringing Lyon with them into the guild. Lamia Scale aided in the disposal of the Balam Alliance, sending three of it`s powerful members as delegates.

character.name: Cait Shelter
character.description: Cait Shelter is one of the top four guilds in Fiore. Little if any information on them is revealed with the exception of their ancestry and that they sent a delegate to aid in the battle against the Oración Seis.

character.name: Charles
character.description: Charle is an Exceed, similar to Happy, and the daughter of Queen Shagotte and apparent chaperon to Wendy Marvell. Both she and Wendy belonged to the Cait Shelter Guild before joining Fairy Tail.

character.name: Ichiya Wanderlei Kotobuki
character.description: Ichiya Wanderlei Kotobuki (Which means One Night to go along with the others) is one of the top mages of the Blue Pegasus Guild, as well as the leader of The Trimens (composed of Hibiki Laytis, Ren Akatsuki and Eve Thylm).

character.name: Hibiki Leytis
character.description: Hibiki Laytis (known as Hundred Night Hibiki) is one of the mages who belong to the Blue Pegasus Guild`s team The Trimens.

character.name: Eve Tilm
character.description: Eve Thylm (known as Holy Night Eve) is one of the mages who belong to the Blue Pegasus Guild`s team The Trimens.

character.name: Ren Akatsuki
character.description: Ren Akatsuki (known as Empty Night Ren) is one of the mages who belong to the Blue Pegasus Guild`s team The Trimens.

character.name: Trimens
character.description: The Trimens a team of effeminate womanizing men from the Blue Pegasus Guild.

character.name: Jura Nekis
character.description: Jura Nekis is a mage of the Lamia Scale Guild, where he was widely considered the ace member, and one of the Ten Wizard Saints.

character.name: Rune Knights
character.description: A subdivison within the council that does their dirtywork. The Rune Kights go around enforcing the council`s ideals of justice. With the new council, they have become increasingly strict.

character.name: Element 4
character.description: The Phantom Lord Guild`s S-Class mages. The Element 4 played a huge role in the Fairy Tail/Phantom Lord war. After the Fairy Tail Guild won the war, Phantom Lord was disbanded so it is assumed that with one of them joining Fairy Tail, the Element 4 have disbanded as well.

character.name: Ivan Dreyar
character.description: Ivan Dreyar is the father of Laxus Dreyar and the son of Makarov and master/founder of the Raven Tail Guild.

character.name: Raven Tail
character.description: Raven Tail is a Dark Guild founded by Ivan Dreyar, he formed it for the sole purpose of destroying his former guild the Fairy Tail Guild. It is stationed in a hollowed out mountain.

character.name: Rob
character.description: Rob is a Fairy Tail mage who was kidnapped and enslaved in the Tower of Heaven. He was also a close friend of Makarov and Erza.

character.name: Team Natsu
character.description: The Team Natsu forms in order to go on missions. At the beginning of the series, Natsu`s partner was only Happy but he gains more as time goes on.

character.name: Shadow Gear
character.description: Shadow Gear is a three-mage team that serves as a backbone for the Fairy Tail Guild. Nothing much is known about them.

character.name: Raijinshuu
character.description: Raijinshuu was created by Laxus as his "bodyguards". They worked for Laxus and they are lead by Fried who is the self-proclaimed captain (and is later made a candidate for becoming an S-rank mage). They were originally loners who didn`t socialize or think much about their fellow guild members, but following Laxus`s excommunication they started to open up more.

character.name: Naked Mummy
character.description: A small dark guild that needed money to pay Oración Seis with, they were first shown before the Fight Festival arc, where they fought with Laxus. They then appeared again when Lucy Heartfilia stopped them from robbing Love & Lucky, and once more when they fought Natsu Dragneel and Gray Fullbuster to stop them from finding Wendy Marvell.

character.name: Death`s Head Caucus
character.description: Another dark guild that appears in the Tower of Heaven arc that are known for being unmatched in their number of successful assassinations. The only known members, the team Trinity Raven, participated in Jellal Fernandes`s Heaven`s Game against the Fairy Tail members. The guild seems to be extremely powerful, as all three members were on the same or stronger level than the Fairy Tail Guild`s Team Natsu members, including Erza Scarlet who is an S-class mage.

character.name: Eisenwald
character.description: The dark guild Eisenwald was a guild that specialized in assassinations. Because the Magic Council prohibits mages from taking assassination requests, the guild was ousted from the Mage Guild League six years ago, and became categorized as a Dark Guild. After a failed plot to assassinate the guild masters, they were all put in jail. It was later revealed at the beginning of the Oracion Seis arc that Eisenwald was actually one of the subordinate guilds to Oracion Seis.

character.name: Gemini
character.description: Gemini or Gemi and Mini are Celestial Spirits and one of the 12 Golden Zodiac Keys. They possess the ability to mimic the appearances and abilities of others.

character.name: Scorpio
character.description: Scorpio is a Celestial Spirit that is one of the 12 Golden Zodiac Keys. His key is currently owned by Lucy. He is also Aquarius`s boyfriend with which he has a happy relationship. His weapon appears to be a large, strange gun shaped like a scorpion`s tail.

character.name: Klodoa
character.description: Klodoa is the seventh member of the Oración Seis, although he is more usually Brain`s staff.

character.name: Roubaul
character.description: Roubaul is the Guild Master of the Cait Shelter Guild.

character.name: Mini
character.description: Gemini or Gemi and Mini are Celestial Spirits and one of the 12 Golden Zodiac Keys. They possess the ability to mimic the appearances and abilities of others.

character.name: Juvia Loxar
character.description: Juvia is a member of Edolas Fairy Tail guild. She is the Edolas counterpart of Juvia Loxar.

character.name: Gray Surge
character.description: Gray Surge is a member of Edolas Fairy Tail and counterpart of http://anidb.net/ch12250 [Gray Fullbuster].

character.name: Elfman
character.description: Edolas Elfman is a member of Edolas Fairy Tail Guild, and a counterpart of Earth http://anidb.net/ch13896 [Elfman Strauss].

character.name: Jet
character.description: Jet is a member of Edolas Fairy Tail Guild, and a counterpart of Earth http://anidb.net/ch17607 [Sarusuke].

character.name: Droy
character.description: Edolas Droy is a member of Edolas Fairy Tail Guild, and a counterpart of Earth http://anidb.net/ch17611 [Droy].

character.name: Macao Conbolt
character.description: Macao Conbolt is a member of Edolas Fairy Tail guild. He is the Edolas counterpart of http://anidb.net/ch17626 [Macao Conbolt].

character.name: Wakaba Mine
character.description: Edolas Wakaba Mine is a member of Edolas Fairy Tail Guild, and a counterpart of Earth http://anidb.net/ch17635 [Wakaba Mine].

character.name: Warren Rocko
character.description: Edolas Warren Rocko is a member of Edolas Fairy Tail Guild, and a counterpart of Earth http://anidb.net/ch20956 [Warren Rocko].

character.name: Max Alors
character.description: Edolas Max Alors is a member of Edolas Fairy Tail Guild, and a counterpart of Earth http://anidb.net/ch17623 [Max Alors].

character.name: Nab Lasaro
character.description: Edolas Nab Lasaro is a member of Edolas Fairy Tail Guild, and a counterpart of Earth http://anidb.net/ch17630 [Nab Lasaro].

character.name: Alzack Connell
character.description: Edolas Alzack Connell is a member of Edolas Fairy Tail Guild, and a counterpart of http://anidb.net/ch13929 [Earth Land] Alzack.

character.name: Bisca Moulin
character.description: Edolas Bisca is a member of Edolas Fairy Tail Guild and a counterpart of http://anidb.net/ch13928 [Bisca Mulan] from Earth Land.

character.name: Kana Alberona
character.description: Cana is a member of Edolas Fairy Tail Guild and a counterpart of http://anidb.net/ch13897 [Cana Alberona] from Earth Land.

character.name: Reedus Jonah
character.description: Edolas Reedus Jonah is a member of Edolas Fairy Tail Guild, and a counterpart of Earth http://anidb.net/ch17629 [Reedus Jonah].

character.name: Lucy Ashley
character.description: Lucy Ashley is Edolas counterpart of http://anidb.net/ch11720 [Lucy Heartfilia].

character.name: Natsu Dragion
character.description: Natsu Dragion is the Edolas counterpart of http://anidb.net/ch11801 [Natsu Dragneel].

character.name: Wendy Marvell
character.description: Wendy is a member of Edolas Fairy Tail Guild and the counterpart of Earth http://anidb.net/ch22290 [Wendy Marvell].

character.name: Mirajane
character.description: Mirajane is a member of Edolas Fairy Tail and a counterpart of Earth Land http://anidb.net/ch13894 [Mirajane].

character.name: Fairy Tail (Edolas)
character.description: The Fairy Tail Guild from Edolas is an alternate universe counterpart of the http://anidb.net/ch18752 [Fairy Tail] Guild from Earth Land. The Fairy Tail Guild was only magic guild in the whole Edolas realm and was treated like a Dark Guild since mage guilds are banned. It was therefore targeted by the Royal Army for destruction. Now that Mystogan sucked all the magic of Edolas to Earth Land, it doesn`t have any magic anymore.

character.name: Sugarboy
character.description: Sugarboy is from Edolas and is the Royal Army Captain of the 4th Magical Division. He works for Faust in Edolas helping him in various ways such as hunting Fairy Tail, and seems to be very into statistics of things.

character.name: Erza Knightwalker
character.description: Erza Knightwalker is part of the Edolas Kingdom and is a Royal Army Captain of the 2nd Magic War Division. She is the Edolas counterpart of http://anidb.net/ch12249 [Erza Scarlet]. Her counterpart`s surname, "Scarlet" was replaced with "Knightwalker".

character.name: Levy
character.description: Levy is a member of Edolas Fairy Tail Guild, Edolas Shadow Gear and the counterpart of http://anidb.net/ch13898 [Levy McGarden]. She is in charge of the guild`s transportation system.

character.name: Panther Lily
character.description: Pantherlily is an Exceed, that used to work for the kingdom of Edolas as the Magic Militia`s First Division Commander of the Royal Army. He is currently a member of the Fairy Tail Guild.

character.name: Gajeel
character.description: Negative image of http://anidb.net/ch17638 [Gajeel Redfox] from an alternative dimension.

character.name: Nichiya
character.description: Ichiya counterpart in Edolas as Exceed.

character.name: Shagotte
character.description: Shagotte is Exceed and is the queen of Extalia. She is called Goddess by Exceeds.

character.name: Metalicana
character.description: Metalicana is a dragon known as the Iron Dragon and foster father of Gajeel Redfox.

character.name: Edolas
character.description: Edolas is a dimension separate from Earth Land. It is the parallel world of Earthland where magic cannot exist within a human`s body. It once had a limited supply of Magic, and is now completely out of Magic.

character.name: Extalia
character.description: Extalia was a kingdom of Exceed. It was located on the flying island above the capital of Edolas.

character.name: Zeref Dragneel
character.description: Zeref, the black magic Wizard, is known as "the most astrological wizard in the history book of wizards" and supposedly long dead. He used "Dying Magic", with which he created 8 of evil spells and demons such as the Deliora, which is Evil, destroyed cities, and killed animals until being sealed and thus destroyed by Ul.

character.name: Kinana
character.description: Kinana is one of the newest members of the Fairy Tail Guild,and the former pet of Oracion Seis Member, Cobra. Unlike most other members of Fairy Tail, she joined the guild as an employee rather than as a Mage.

character.name: Joy Fullbun
character.description: Joy Fullbun is a member of Fairy Tail. He joined around the same time as Wang ChanJi, and therefore are often partners and rivals.

character.name: Chico C Hammitt
character.description: Chico C Hammitt is the daughter of the owner of Fairy Hills, Ruchio. She is a former Mage of the Fairy Tail Guild. Her magic allowes her to collect the wandering souls within Magnolia Town, she can use them for combat. However, if she steps out of Magnolia, even for one second, she has to recollect all the souls again. Source: Fairy Tail Wiki

character.name: Wang Chanji
character.description: Wang Chanji is a member of Fairy Tail. Being a quiet person, he rarely speaks. In one incidence, he did not speak for more than one hour`s time in one whole year.

character.name: Org
character.description: Org is a member of the Magic council.

character.name: Guran Doma
character.description: Guran Doma is the new Chairman of the Magic Council.

character.name: Doranbolt
character.description: Doranbolt is a member of the Magic Council who uses Memory Control Magic to decieve everyone in Fairy Tail into believing he was a member of the Guild named Mest Gryder.

character.name: Vulcan
character.description: Vulcans are ferocious monsters that inhabit Mt. Hakobe and also some forests in Fiore, known to live in large packs. They are physically strong, and smarter than most animals, since they are capable of forming simple sentences. Vulcans use Take Over Magic and survive by taking over human bodies.

character.name: Azuma
character.description: Azuma is stern, muscular man who can manipulate the magic in the earth to control plant life and create explosive fruit using the Great Tree Arc.

character.name: Zancrow
character.description: Zancrow is a psychotic God Slayer who can perform Flame God Slayer magic, which allows him to conjure black flames that cannot be consumed by Natsu.

character.name: Meredy
character.description: She was first shown on an airship, which belongs to her guild, Grimoire Heart.

character.name: Kain Hikaru
character.description: He is an obese and clumsy man who uses voodoo-like magic called Ushi no Koku Mairi to control people`s movements via an enchanted doll.

character.name: Capricorn
character.description: Celestial spirit Capricorn is possessed by the celestial wizard Zoldeo, and can summon humans he had trapped in an alternate dimension using a technique called Human Subordination magic.

character.name: Zoldeo
character.description: Zoldeo is celestial wizard who possessed celestial spirit Capricorn.

character.name: Rustyrose
character.description: Rustyrose is a poetic, bespectacled man who can materialize any object from his imagination at will using the Arc of Embodiment.

character.name: Bluenote Stinger
character.description: Bluenote Stinger is deputy commander in Grimoire Heart. He can increase the gravity around himself to immobilize his opponents, and can create black holes.

character.name: Layla Heartfilia
character.description: Layla Heartfilia was Lucy Heartfilia`s mother, and wife of Jude Heartfilia. She was also a Celestial Spirit Mage.

character.name: Wonderful Gotche
character.description: Wonderful Gocche is the leader of the Jiggle Butt Gang. He and his gang meet Haru while attempting to rob a train.

character.name: Mavis Vermilion
character.description: Mavis Vermilion was the first master and the founder of the Fairy Tail Guild.

character.name: Trinity Raven
character.description: Trinity Raven, also known as the Special Raiding Squadron of Assassins, was an elite trio of Mages from the Assassins` Guild Death`s Head Caucus. Source: fairytail.wikia.com

character.name: Rengoku no Nana Kenzoku
character.description: The Seven Kin of Purgatory is the strongest team of the Grimoire Heart Guild.

character.name: Seiten Daimadou
character.description: The Ten Wizard Saints are ten of the most powerful and skilled Mages in the world. A Mage is granted this title by the Chairman of the Magic Council. Source: fairytail.wikia.com

character.name: Acnologia
character.description: Acnologia, also known as The Black Dragon (黒龍, Kokuryuu), and fearsomely reputed as The Black Dragon in the Book of Apocalypse, is a powerful Dragon that appears to be flying around the continent or the world. He seems to have some connection with Zeref; the depths of this relationship are as of yet unknown. Source: fairytail.wikia.com

character.name: Nadal
character.description: Nadal is one of the assistants of the Magic Council, and one of the two guards assigned to watch over Gerard Fernandes. Source: http://fairytail.wikia.com

character.name: Alzack Connell
character.description: Alzack Connell is a Mage from the West. He came to Fairy Tail as an immigrant and joined the Guild. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Macao Conbolt
character.description: Macao Conbolt is a Mage of Fairy Tail, and the fourth Guild Master following the disappearance of Makarov and the guild`s S-Class Mages. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Wakaba Mine
character.description: Wakaba Mine is a veteran Mage of the Fairy Tail guild. He`s a long-time friend of Macao Conbolt, and was his advisor during the latter`s time as the guild`s Fourth Guild Master. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Max Alors
character.description: Max Alors is a Mage of the Fairy Tail guild who is apparently in charge of most of the guild`s social activities, given his love for talking to people. He specializes in Sand Magic. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Vijeeter Ecor
character.description: Vijeeter Ecor is a Mage of the Fairy Tail Guild. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Teebo
character.description: Teebo is a Mage from the Twilight Ogre Guild in Magnolia Town. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Twilight Ogre
character.description: Twilight Ogre is one of the Legal Guilds. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Banaboster
character.description: Banaboster is the Guild Master of the Twilight Ogre Guild in Magnolia. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Ooya-san
character.description: Ooya-san is the owner of Lucy`s Apartment. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Yuuka Suzuki
character.description: Yuuka Suzuki, is a Mage of Lamia Scale Guild and one of Lyon Vastia`s allies. He served as the guild`s anti-Mage, as his Wave Magic could cancel out others` Magic. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Aceto Balsamico
character.description: Aceto is the daughter of Count Balsamico. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Balsamico Hakushaku
character.description: Balsamico Hakushaku is the father of Aceto and the owner of Balsamico Castle. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Velveno
character.description: Velveno is an escaped convict with a 2,000,000 Jewels bounty on his head, which increases to 4,000,000 Jewels in by the year X791. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Michelle Lobster
character.description: Michelle Lobster is a distant relative of Lucy Heartfilia and a member of the wealthy Lobster Family. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Asuka Connell
character.description: Asuka Connell is the daughter of Fairy Tail Mages, Alzack and Bisca Connell. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Mary Hughes
character.description: Mary Hughes is the Earth Land counterpart of Hughes, who uses Command Magic as her form of Magic. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Sugarboy
character.description: Sugarboy is the Earth Land counterpart of Sugarboy. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Byro Cracy
character.description: Byro is the Earth Land counterpart of Byro. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Legion Tai
character.description: Legion Tai is a secret order of warriors under Zentopia Church. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Zentopia Church
character.description: Zentopia Church is a form of religion in Fiore. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Samuel
character.description: Samuel is an Exceed and the leader of the Legion Tail of Zentopia. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Dan Straight
character.description: Dan Straight is a member of the Legion Corps of Zentopia. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Kanaloa
character.description: Kanaloa is a giant octopus that belongs to Byro Cracy, a member of the Legion Corps of Zentopia. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Lapointe
character.description: Lapointe is a Cardinal of the Zentopia Church. Currently, while Archbishop is sick, he exercises the true authority in Zentopia. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Guttman Kubrick
character.description: Guttman Kubrick is a member of Legion Corps and a former prisoner in the Forbidden Cell of Zentopia`s main prison. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Caelum
character.description: Caelum the "Chisel" is a Silver Keys` Celestial Spirit that can transform between three things for its master. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Imitatia
character.description: Imitatia is a member of the Reborn Oración Seis and mistress of mimicry and deception, initially claiming to be a distant relative of Lucy Heartfilia and a member of the wealthy Lobster Family when first introduced. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Sting Eucliffe
character.description: Sting Eucliffe is a Mage of the currently strongest Guild in Fiore, the Sabertooth Guild. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Frosch
character.description: Frosch is an Exceed and a Mage of the current strongest Guild in Fiore, the Sabertooth Guild. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Lector
character.description: Lector was an Exceed and a Mage of the currently strongest Guild in Fiore, the Sabertooth Guild. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Rogue Cheney
character.description: Rogue Cheney is a Mage of the currently strongest Guild in Fiore, the Sabertooth Guild. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Sabertooth
character.description: Sabertooth is currently the most powerful Legal Guild in the Kingdom of Fiore Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Fabrizio
character.description: Fabrizio is a priest of Zentopia Church who survived the attacks of the Churches by the Shin Oración Seis. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Meredy
character.description: Meredy was a member of Grimoire Heart and one of the Seven Kin of Purgatory. Currently, she`s a member of Crime Sorcière, an Independent Guild. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Crime Sorciere
character.description: Crime Sorcière is an independent guild. The guild`s main objective is to eradicate the evil brought about by Dark Guilds and Zeref along with the guild members seeking redemption for their pasts. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Ooba Babasaama
character.description: Ooba Babasaama is the Guild Master of Lamia Scale. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Mato
character.description: Mato is the official referee and mascot for the Grand Magic Games` events. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Pyxis
character.description: Pyxis, "The Compass", is one of the Silver Keys` Celestial Spirit that is owned by Lucy Heartfilia. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Chapati Lola
character.description: Chapati Lola is the emcee for the Grand Magic Games. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Archadious
character.description: Archadious is a Squadron Chief in the Royal Kingdom of Fiore, though he seems to also have an allegiance towards Zeref. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Kokuou
character.description: Fiore`s King is the unnamed King who rules over the Kingdom of Fiore. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Datong
character.description: Datong is the Minister of Defense of the Kingdom of Fiore. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Libra
character.description: Libra, "The Heavenly Scales" is a Celestial Spirit that is one of the 12 Golden Zodiac Keys. Her key is currently owned by Yukino Aguria. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Pisces
character.description: Pisces, "The Paired Fish" is a Celestial Spirit that is one of the 12 Golden Zodiac Keys. Their key is currently owned by Yukino Aguria. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Ophiuchus
character.description: Ophiuchus, "The Snake Charmer" is a powerful Celestial Spirit whose Gate is referred to as the "13th Gate". Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Jiemma
character.description: Jiemma is the Guild Master of the currently strongest Guild in Fiore, Sabertooth. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Dobengal
character.description: Dobengal is a Mage of the currently strongest Guild in Fiore, Sabertooth and ranks within the top 10 of the guild. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Minerva Orlando
character.description: Minerva is the strongest Mage of the currently strongest Guild in Fiore, Sabertooth Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Rabian
character.description: Rabian is the chairman of the Scheherazade Theater who performs plays. He once hired Team Natsu to stage a play in Onibus Town for him. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Toma E. Fiore
character.description: Toma E. Fiore is the King who rules over the Kingdom of Fiore. During the Grand Magic Games, Toma disguises himself as Mato and is the official mascot and referee for its events. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Bisca Connell
character.description: Bisca Connell, nee Mulan, was originally an immigrant from the West, who moved to Magnolia and joined the Fairy Tail Guild. Currently in year X791, she is the wife of Alzack Connell. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Mirajane Strauss
character.description: http://anidb.net/ch13894 [Mirajane]`s demon form when she uses Satan Soul.

character.name: Mirajane Strauss
character.description: http://anidb.net/ch13894 [Mirajane]`s demon form when she uses Satan Soul: Halphas.

character.name: Mirajane Strauss
character.description: http://anidb.net/ch13894 [Mirajane]`s demon form when she uses Satan Soul: Sitri.

episode.title: 潜入せよ! エバルー屋敷!
Infiltrate the Everlue Mansion
Infiltrons le manoir d`Everlue !
Infiltrando-Se Na Mansão Everlue!!
Sennyuu Seyo! Everlue Yashiki!
episode.summary: Lucy settles into her new apartment. Unbeknown to her, Natsu and Happy enter the apartment and Lucy scolds them. She teaches the two how a wizard makes contracts with celestial spirits. Lucy summons Nicola, forms a contract with him and names him Plue. She accepts a job to steal a book entitled Daybreak from the Everlue Mansion`s corrupt owner Duke Everlue. At Fairy Tail, Makarov reviews that job has been changed to destroying the book and increased the reward. They arrive at Shirotsume and accept the request to burn the book. When Everlue rejects Lucy as a maid and insults her, the three infiltrate the mansion and successfully steal the book. However, Everlue, his maids, and his gorilla-sized celestial spirit Virgo, attacks the three. Lucy flees to the sewers, and discovers the book`s hidden secrets before being caught by Everlue. Meanwhile, Natsu takes on Everlue`s mercenaries, the Vanish Brothers, and defeats them along with Virgo.

episode.title: 火竜と猿と牛
Fire Dragon, Monkey, and Bull
Le dragon de feu, le singe et le taureau
Dragão, Macaco E Touro!
Karyuu to Saru to Ushi
episode.summary: Natsu and Happy bring Lucy to the Fairy Tail guildhall in Magnolia. Joining Fairy Tail, Lucy overhears a conversation between the guild master Makarov Dreyar and Romeo Conbolt to search for his father Macao. Unable to wait for Macao, Natsu and Happy decide to go find the wizard. Lucy travels with Natsu and Happy to Mt. Hakobe and search for Macao. They encounter a monster called a Vulcan and Lucy is captured. Natsu arrives and fights him, but is thrown out of a hole. Lucy summons Taurus to fight the Vulcan, but Natsu goes back into the mountain and inadvertently knocks out Taurus. Natsu defeats the Vulcan and find out that it took control of Macao`s body. After saving Macao, the four return to Magnolia where Romeo reunites with his father.

episode.title: 妖精の尻尾
The Fairy Tail
Fairy Tail
Cauda Encantada!
Yousei no Shippo
episode.summary: Natsu Dragneel and his cat partner Happy arrive in the town of Hargeon in search of a dragon named Igneel. Meanwhile, Lucy Heartfilia, a young wizard determined to join the local wizards` guild Fairy Tail, is hypnotized by Bora, a wizard posing as the famous Salamander of Fairy Tail. Natsu and Happy inadvertently save Lucy after approaching Bora, mistaking "Salamander" for the fire dragon. Later, Bora offers membership of Fairy Tail to Lucy and invites her onto his yacht, where he reveals his plan to smuggle her and other young girls. Natsu and Happy rescue Lucy again and expose Bora as an imposter. Revealing himself to be the real Salamander, Natsu easily defeats Bora with his mastery over fire magic and invites Lucy to join Fairy Tail, which she accepts as they flee from the army.

episode.title: 鎧の魔導士
The Wizard in Armor
Le mage en armure
Maga Blindada!
Yoroi no Madoushi
episode.summary: Natsu and Lucy start looking for a new job to take, but just then Erza, the strongest female wizard in all of Fairy Tail, returns. She`s so powerful all the other people in Fairy Tail are scared stiff, and she immediately asks Natsu and Gray to come help her on a mission. Lucy tags along to keep the two of them from fighting, and on the train Erza tells the story of how she learned of the evil plans of Eisenwald, a dark guild, and how she intends on stopping them. But can the four of them really take on an entire guild by themselves? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 妖精たちは風の中
Fairies in the Wind
Fairy Tail, au coeur de la tempête
Fadas Ao Vento!
Yousei-tachi wa Kaze no Naka
episode.summary: Lullaby turned out to be a flute used for mass-murder curse magic, killing anyone who heard its melody! "Shinigami" Erigor and his dark guild Eisenwald take over Oshibana station, and announces to Erza and the others who came to stop him that he would play the flute to all the people in the area. Erigor leaves to put his plan into action, and the battle begins right away with Erza taking the lead... But it seems like Erigor has some other goal in mind... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 炎と風
Flame and Wind
Les flammes et le vent
Fogo E Vento!
Honoo to Kaze
episode.summary: Eisenwald`s true goal was to play the lullaby at the place the Guild Masters are having their regular meeting! Erigor gets closer and closer to the meeting hall, while Natsu and the others are all trapped in the magic wind wall Erigor set up around the station. At this rate the Guild Masters are in trouble! But just then comes a glimmer of hope in the form of... Lucy?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最強チーム!!!
The Strongest Team!!!
La meilleure des équipes !
A Equipe Mais Forte De Todas!!!
Saikyou Team!!!
episode.summary: Natsu caught up to Erigor after breaking through the magic wind wall, but Natsu`s flames aren`t able to dent Erigor`s perfectly controlled wind! Happy figures out wind`s weakness, however, and Natsu uses his Dragon Slayer magic to stage a sudden comeback! After Lucy and the others arrive, everything would seem to be safe, but Kage suddenly takes back the flute and heads towards the Guild Masters! It`s just one setback after another; can they ever truly stop the lullaby?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ナツ, 村を食う
Natsu Devours a Village
Natsu mange un village
Natsu Devora Uma Vila!
Natsu, Mura o Kuu
episode.summary: Natsu and the others get lost in the depths of Clover Canyon, a great natural labyrinth, on the way back from stopping the dark guild Eisenwald`s evil schemes. They stumble upon a suspicious looking village, but don`t care as long as they find something to eat! Food comes first! Moving houses, galloping chairs, whatever! As long as they`re edible! But this village holds a secret truth... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ナツVSエルザ
Natsu vs. Erza
Natsu contre Erza
Natsu Vs Erza!
Natsu VS Erza
episode.summary: What a battle! Natsu vs. Erza!! The flames of a Dragon Slayer vs. the armored Fairy Queen! Fairy Tail is expecting fireworks; this guild settles things with their fists! Natsu`s all fired up and doesn`t give an inch to Erza, but just then... A messenger shows up from the council talking about illegal actions during the Eisenwald incident, and he has an arrest warrant for Erza?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: DEAR KABY[親愛なるカービィへ]
Dear Kaby
Mon cher Kaby
Dear Kaby ~ Querido Kaby ~!
Shin`ainaru Kaby e
episode.summary: Duke Everlue is about to crush Lucy when Happy appears and ends his struggle. Lucy summons Cancer, her crab spirit. Oblivious to Natsu`s presence, Duke Everlue summons Virgo. Lucy and Cancer easily defeat him. They take the book back to Kaby, the son of the book`s author Zekua. Kaby explains that his father considered Daybreak to be the worst book he had ever written, and intends to destroy it to protect his father`s honor. However, Lucy reveals that the book contains a secret message for Kaby from his father as an apology for neglecting him over the years while writing the book for Everlue. To Lucy`s chagrin, Natsu and Happy respectfully decline the reward as Kaby does not have as much money as he claimed he would give.

episode.title: ナツVS.波動のユウカ
Natsu vs. Yuka the Wave User
Natsu contre les ondes de Yuka
Natsu Vs Yuuka, O Hadou!
Natsu VS Hadou no Yuuka
episode.summary: Reitei Lyon`s lackeys are attacking! They`re going to dump nuke`em jelly on the village to wipe it off the map! Natsu`s really mad and faces off against a wizard that can`t be affected by magic, Yuka "The Wave," and "Paralyze Claw" Tobi!! And Lucy`s in a real jam when her Celestial Spirit gets controlled by Doll Attack magic wielding Sherry! With Gray out of the battle, with the odds against them, with match ups giving the enemy an advantage... Can Fairy Tail win?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 月の雫[ムーンドリップ]
Moon Drip
Les gouttes de lune
Moon Drip!
Moon Drip
episode.summary: While searching for clues on how to undo the curse on the island, they come across a suspicious temple ruin. There they discover the immortal demon, Deliora, that Gray`s old teacher Ul had sealed in the Northern Continent. A man who calls himself Reitei is using the magical power from the moon to break that seal, but when Gray hears his voice... What does Galuna`s curse have to do with Deliora, and what relation does Reitei have to Gray?! What is the true meaning behind the curse?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 呪われた島
The Cursed Island
L`île maudite
Ilha Amaldiçoada!
Norowareta Shima
episode.summary: S class quests... Requests so dangerous only wizards that the master gives permission to go on them. And yet, Natsu, Lucy and Happy go off on one of these S class quests on their own without permission! They head out to "Galuna, the cursed island," and it turns out the people there are turning into demons from the evil spell of the moon! They learn that there is only one way to undo the curse, and that`s to destroy the moon itself! But how in the world are they going to complete a request to "destroy the moon?" Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 永遠の魔法
Eternal Magic
La magie éternelle
Magia Eterna!
Eien no Mahou
episode.summary: The origins of Gray and Lyon are finally revealed. Ten years ago... It was Ul and Lyon that rescued Gray after his parents were killed and he was injured by Deliora. Taken in as her pupil along with Lyon, they train day and night in Creation Magic. But then Gray hears the location of Deliora, and recklessly challenges Deliora in battle. The tragedy that unfolds because of it is... Gray, burdened by his past sins, and Lyon who`s lost his dream... The time has come for the two of them to settle things!! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 勝手にしやがれ!!
Just Do Whatever!!
Le gagnant fait ce qui lui plait
Dever De Casa!!
Katte ni Shiyagare!!
episode.summary: With her spirits being controlled, it doesn`t look like Lucy has a chance to win! But a Fairy Tail wizard never gives up!! She risks everything by summoning her trump card, Aquarius, and... On the other hand, Natsu heads below where Lyon is, trying to destroy the the supports and tilt the ruins to prevent Deliora from being resurrected! It`s time for round two against the out of control Lyon! This time he`ll get pounded with some flaming fists for sure! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: BURST
Burst
Burst
Burst!
Burst
episode.summary: Deliora`s roar echoes across the Island!! Natsu faces off against the "time manipulator" Zalty while Erza stops the ceremony above, but it`s all in vain as the immortal demon is resurrected once more! Gray decides to use the sacrificial magic, Iced Shell, to seal Deliora in eternal ice just like Ul once did before him, but Natsu stands against it! And just as its villainous fist finds Natsu and the others, events take an unexpected turn... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ガルナ島 最終決戦
The Final Showdown on Galuna Island
L’île de Galuna – La bataille finale
A Batalha Final Na Ilha Galuna!
Garuna-tou Saishuu Kessen
episode.summary: Ul gave her life to seal Deliora, and Gray is attacking in order to prevent that from happening, even if it costs him his life. On the other side of things, Natsu faces off against the masked weirdo, Zalty. Somehow Zalty used time manipulation magic to undo Natsu`s tilting of the ruins, and the Moon Drip ceremony has restarted! The ice is melting, and Deliora gives off a roar! It`s only a matter of time until the demon of disaster is resurrected... And if it does, what is Gray prepared to do to stop it? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 届け あの空に
Reach the Sky Above
La mission ! Vers le Ciel !
Alcance esse Céu
Todoke Ano Sora ni
episode.summary: "We`re now going to destroy the moon." That`s what Erza said all matter-of-fact in front of the villagers who are still stuck in the forms of demons even though Deliora has been defeated. Combing the throwing power of the Giant Armor and the Lance of Haja that has the power to repel darkness with the hyper acceleration of Natsu`s flames, they make an all-out attack on the moon! Erza`s full of confidence, but there`s no way it could actually reach the moon... Wait, the moon actually cracked?! What could be the unexpected hidden truth behind it all? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: チェンジリング
Changeling
Changeling
Changeling!
Change Ring
episode.summary: Figure out what this writing means." That`s what the poster on the request board said. But the instant someone read the ancient writing, Natsu, Lucy, and Happy switched minds with Loke, Gray, and Erza! And not only that, if this ancient spell isn`t lifted within 30 minutes, they`ll be stuck like that forever! Caught in a jam no one could have predicted, the guild is in more of an uproar than usual! What`s going to happen to everyone?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 15分
15 Minutes
15 minutes
15 Minutos
15 Fun
episode.summary: With Makarov off the battlefield, Fairy Tail had no choice but to withdraw! Natsu and the others try to cheer up Lucy now that she realizes Phantom Lord`s goal was capturing her. Phantom Lord comes to strike the final blow, using their guild itself! And Jose tries to use the Magic Focusing Cannon, Jupiter, to erase Fairy Tail completely! Do Natsu and the others have any way to withstand the onslaught? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ルーシィ・ハートフィリア
Lucy Heartfilia
Lucy HeartFillia
Lucy Heartfilia
Lucy Heartfilia
episode.summary: The members of Fairy Tail are angry, and it shows in their fists! Natsu takes on the Iron Dragon Slayer Gajeel to pay him back for busting up the guild! Things are going well for them, and Master Makarov finally meets face to face with the master of Phantom Lord, Jose! But what`s this near Jose`s feet? Lucy`s been captured?! Makarov can`t hide his surprise that Jose`s true aim was capturing Lucy! What is the secret truth behind this whole confrontation? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 幽鬼の支配者
The Phantom Lord
Phantom Lord
Lorde Fantasma!
Yuuki no Shihaisha
episode.summary: Conflict has erupted between the guilds?! Phantom Lord has hit Fairy Tail with a sneak attack! Makarov manages to get control over the furious Natsu who wants to strike back, but then the same evil befalls Levy and her team! Makarov cannot let this stand, of course, and declares war. He leads all the guild members to Phantom Lord to teach them a lesson they won`t soon forget. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ナツとドラゴンの卵
Natsu and the Dragon Egg
Natsu et l’oeuf du dragon
Natsu e o Ovo de Dragão!
Natsu to Dragon no Tamago
episode.summary: Mirajane tells a story from Fairy Tail`s past, thanks to Lucy accidentally finding a drawing of Natsu, Gray, Erza, Mira, Elfman and everyone else from six years ago. But wait, where`s Happy? And why is there a dragon? The story behind the birth of the mysterious flying cat, Happy, will be revealed! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: その涙を見ない為に
To Keep from Seeing Those Tears
Pour ne pas voir tes larmes
Para que ninguém possa ver as lágrimas
Sono Namida o Minai Tame ni
episode.summary: Natsu, Gray, and Elfman have infiltrated Phantom Lord`s headquarters. Although Natsu manages to destroy Jupiter and the lookout somehow, Phantom has yet another trump card! Incredibly, the guild itself transforms into the magical giant Phantom Mk II, and starts casting the forbidden magic Abyss Break trying to wipe out the entire guild at once. With no time to spare, a member of the Element 4 appears before Elfman! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 雨の中に咲く花
A Flower Blooms in the Rain
La fleur qui s`épanouit sous la pluie
Uma flor desabrocha na Chuva
Ame no Naka ni Saku Hana
episode.summary: Elfman crushes Sol of the Land, one of the Element 4! Afterwards, the Phantom Mk II seems to slow down for some reason. That`s because the giant moves using the power of the Element 4. If all of the Element 4 are defeated, they can stop Abyss Break! There are only two left! Natsu faces off against Aria of the Heavens and Gray faces off against Juvia of the Deep! There`s almost no time left until Abyss Break is finished casting! What will be the outcome of Fairy Tail`s life-or-death struggle?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 炎の翼
Wings of Flame
Les ailes de feu
Asas de Fogo!
Honoo no Tsubasa
episode.summary: Natsu challenges Aria of the Heavens with plenty of vigor, but faced with Aria`s Airspace magic he can`t even make a dent, and the fight is completely one-sided. Just then, somehow Erza arrives, despite being almost mortally wounded earlier! Does a wounded Erza even have a chance to win against the one known as the strongest of the Element 4? Elsewhere, Lucy is recaptured by Gajeel! Phantom Lord gathers its strength... What will be the next stage in this epic struggle?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 二人の滅竜魔導士[ドラゴンスレイヤー]
The Two Dragon Slayers
Les deux chasseurs de dragons
Os Dois Caçadores de Dragão
Futari no Dragonslayer
episode.summary: The two Dragon Slayers clash fist-to-fist! Natsu challenges Gajeel with fists full of anger, furious at what he`s done to Lucy. A battle between two Dragon Slayers is as fierce as one between two dragons themselves! But Natsu, exhausted from his serious of battles with the Element 4, begins to be pressured by Gajeel, and the fight slowly goes in Phantom Lord`s direction... Under this intense battle, what will become of Fairy Tail? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: フェアリーロウ
Fairy Law
La loi des fées
Fairy Law
Fairy Law
episode.summary: The powerful foes of the Element 4 and Iron Dragon Gajeel have been crushed by Natsu and the gang! All that`s left is Jose, named as one of the Ten Wizard Saints. Erza puts everything on her own shoulders and challenges him, but faced with his overwhelming magical power it was only a matter of time until she was defeated. But just then, Makarov returns after having regained his magical power! This battle which has caused such sadness... With anger and pride in his heart, what spell does Makarov pull out?! The light of righteousness will now pass judgment upon thee!! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: あたしの決意
My Resolve
C’est mon choix
Minha Decisão
Atashi no Ketsui
episode.summary: The war against Phantom Lord with the guild`s pride on the line has now been over for a week. The biggest scar left was the destroyed guild, and with reconstruction commencing Fairy Tail gets back to normal. But the targeted Lucy with painful memories of her father leaves a note that says she`s going home! Loving Fairy Tail as much as she does, what could her intentions be? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: NEXT GENERATION
Next Generation
Next Generation
Geração Futura!
Next Generation
episode.summary: The next generation lies on the shoulders of the young. Fairy Tail has candidates for the next master like Laxus and Erza, but Makarov doesn`t feel the time is quite right yet to give up his position. Then, Fairy Tail`s strongest team, centered around Erza, goes on a mission! In high spirits, they set out to handle the request to help put on a play... Or so they thought, because it seems there`s been a casting change! Could this actually be entertaining to everyone? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 空に戻れない星
A Star Removed from the Sky
L’étoile tombée des cieux
A estrela que não pode retornar ao céu!
Sora ni Modorenai Hoshi
episode.summary: Everyone heads to the spa town of Hosenka for some R&R after a job. There, the gang coincidentally runs into Loke! As usual, Loke keeps his distance from Lucy, but something is different about him from before... Then, suddenly, Loke makes a stunning confessions to Lucy! His incredible, unspeakable truth is... Loke`s secrets that no one knows will be revealed! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 星霊王
Celestial Spirit King
Le roi des constellations
O Rei dos Espiritos
Seirei Ou
episode.summary: Loke`s crime was breaking the law of the Spirit World in order to protect his friend. As a result, Loke is forbidden to return to the Spirit World and his life-force is slowly eroding away. Loke wishes to disappear from the world in order to repent for his sins, but Lucy, who loves all spirits, won`t stand for it! "Caring for your friends is not a crime!" she cries, but will it reach all the way to the Spirit World? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 楽園の塔
The Tower of Heaven
La Tour du Paradis
Torre Cesletial!
Rakuen no Tou
episode.summary: Some Fairy R&R?! In other words, Natsu and the others are forgetting about work and spreading their wings on the beach! But, it only felt like a vacation for a short while, as they suddenly are faced with a crisis: Erza and Happy are kidnapped! However, the bunch that did it used to be Erza`s "friends"! Erza`s hidden past will now begin to rock the world to its core! And what is this "Tower of Heaven" that they are headed toward? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ジェラール
Jellal
Jellal
Jellal!
Gerard
episode.summary: Erza has an unexpected connection to Jellal, who used to be her comrade in the past. He rules over the Tower of Heaven, aka the R-system, in other words a forbidden magic used to resurrect someone from the dead! While Natsu and the gang try and infiltrate the tower to save Erza and Happy without really knowing what`s going on, the Council, now aware of the tower`s existence, begins to make a frightful decision in order to destroy it... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 闇の声
Voice of Darkness
L’appel des ténèbres
Voz Da Escuridão!
Yami no Koe
episode.summary: Erza`s secret past... In return for battling for her freedom from forced labor, she "loses" Jellal! Possessed by the black wizard Zeref, Jellal turns into evil itself... What is the sad truth that lays between him and Erza? Meanwhile, the Council continues their deliberations as to whether to use their ultimate weapon of destruction, Etherion! Everyone is headed to an uncertain fate! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 楽園ゲーム
Heaven`s Game
Le Jeu du Paradis
Jogo Sagrado!
Rakuen Game
episode.summary: Jellal is trying to use Erza as the living sacrifice in the ceremony to resurrect Zeref. He starts a battle royal between Natsu and the others with the three wizards "Trinity Raven" from the Assassin`s Guild, and names it "Heaven`s Game." And not only that, it`s a battle where everyone`s life could end at any moment if the Magic Council fires Etherion! With Jellal watching over everything with an evil grin on his face, the battle moves on to the next stage! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 心の鎧
Armor of the Heart
L’armure du coeur
Armadura Do Coração!
Kokoro no Yoroi
episode.summary: It`s Heaven`s Game where your life is on the line! Natsu faces off against the birdbrained "Warrior of Justice" Fukurou, while Lucy and Juvia battle the punk hair-flinging rocker Vidaldus Taka! They might seem silly, but as members of the Assassin`s Guild they mean serious business! Faced with such odd forms of magic, the battles take an unexpected turn! Can Natsu and the others find the light of hope that can free Erza from her past while a strike from Etherion looms? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 妖精女王[ティターニア], 散る
Titania Falls
La chute de la reine des fées
A Queda De Titania!
Titania, Chiru
episode.summary: Natsu vs. Jellal! Natsu is hardly able to scratch Jellal, having regained his true magical powers. So, deciding to just try and destroy the tower itself, he angers Jellal who launches the ultimate Heavenly Body Magic, "Altairis," deciding to destroy Erza and Natsu together! They`re in serious trouble, as anything in the path of that spell is doomed! Is this the time for Natsu to finally show his true worth as a Dragon Slayer? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 聖なる光に祈りを
Give Our Prayers to the Sacred Light
Une prière pour la lumière sainte
Rezando Sob A Luz Sagrada!
Seinaru Hikari ni Inori o
episode.summary: Finally, the time has come... With only Natsu, Erza, and Jellal left in the Tower of Heaven, Etherion comes raining down! But in the instant everyone cries out for the victims, something amazing occurs! The outside of the tower is destroyed, revealing it to be a giant lacrima! The council had been used by Jellal in his fiendish plot! The unbelievable truth behind Jellal will be revealed! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 運命[デスティニー]
Destiny
Destinée
Destino!
Destiny
episode.summary: With Vidaldus Taka defeated, only Ikaruga of Trinity Raven remains! Erza stands strong in her resolve, but the flashes of the sword Ikaruga draws are amazingly able to shatter even Erza`s powerful armor! Etherion begins counting down, and there is barely any time left before it fires. Will Erza defeat this powerful foe and make it to Jellal in time?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 友の為に友を討て
Defeat Your Friends to Save Your Friends
Attaque ton ami pour le sauver
Derrotando Amigos Para Salvar Amigos!
Tomo no Tame ni Tomo o Ute
episode.summary: The Battle of Fairy Tail moves into high gear, and contestants are falling left and right... And they`re all members of Fairy Tail! Forced to fight each other to save their friends, the Fairy Tail Wizards` backs are up against a wall... With the weakest out of the way, the Raijin Tribe themselves start to join in the mix, and they aren`t Laxus`s personal guard for nothing! Meanwhile, Natsu can`t get out of the guild and Erza has been turned to stone... Is there anyone left strong enough to defeat them?! The battle begins to look hopeless, until... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: バトル・オブ・フェアリーテイル
Battle of Fairy Tail
La bataille de Fairy Tail
Batalha Na Fairy Tail!
Battle of Fairy Tail
episode.summary: The entire city of Magnolia is busy preparing for the Harvest Festival, and no place is busier than Fairy Tail itself! Every year they put on a magnificent parade called the "Fantasia" which people come from all around the continent to see! Lucy, however, is more worried about how she`s going to pay next month`s rent, and decides to enter the Miss Fairy Tail contest to earn some money before the parade. Here come all the beauties of Fairy Tail, doing their best to appeal to the audience! But just then a new contestant appears, and she`s got the competition frozen stiff... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: HOME
Home
Home
Lar!
Home
episode.summary: With the Tower of Heaven destroyed, the curse of Erza`s past has been lifted, and Sho and the others decide to try going off on their own. When Natsu and the others get back to Magnolia, they find waiting for them a Fairy Tail reborn! It`s awesome, with a pool, and a game parlor... However, even though the guild is new, the people inside are just as rambunctious as ever. Just then, the big dog returns, and he ain`t satisfied with the way things are with the guild... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 神鳴殿
Thunder Palace
Le palais de la foudre
Palácio Do Trovão!
Kaminariden
episode.summary: Erza`s back and she`s ready to end the Battle of Fairy Tail once and for all! Facing off against Evergreen, Erza knows that if she takes this Raijin Tribe member out, the rest of the stone statue hostages will return to normal, and that means Game Over for Laxus! But things don`t go as simply as planned, for Laxus has a backup plan up his sleeve... Above Magnolia are floating countless number of thunder lacrima, primed and charged to rain lightning down on the innocent people below. They`re Laxus`s ultimate weapon, the Thunder Palace! Can Fairy Tail recoup, find Laxus, and defeat him before time runs out? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 幻想曲[ファンタジア]
Fantasia
Fantasia
Fantasia!
Fantasia
episode.summary: Laxus has invoked Fairy Law, the ultimate spell of his grandfather`s that passes judgment upon all whom the caster deems an enemy. But as if a miracle, no one in the guild or Magnolia seems to be affected at all? Could Laxus have made a mistake casting the spell? Or is there some deeper reason that saved everyone from destruction? And more importantly, can Fairy Tail regroup in time to put on their big parade, the Fantasia?! The Battle of Fairy Tail comes to its shocking conclusion... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: トリプル ドラゴン
Triple Dragons
Triple Dragon
Dragão Triplo!
Triple Dragon
episode.summary: Finally, the showdown between Natsu and Laxus begins to determine just who the strongest wizard is in Fairy Tail! Meanwhile, Erza is in a battle against time to destroy all the hundreds of lacrima floating above Magnolia, moments away from raining destruction on the unsuspecting townspeople. Even Erza realizes she doesn`t have enough power to destroy all of them at once, and just when things look grim, a voice calls out... Meanwhile, Natsu gives it his best against Laxus, but faced with such overwhelming power his attacks seem to do nothing. Might even Natsu have to get some help to protect the guild he loves? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 激突! カルディア大聖堂
Clash at Kardia Cathedral!
Catastrophe à la cathédrale de Kaldia
Conflito Na Catedral Kardia!
Gekitotsu! Kardia Daiseidou
episode.summary: With the master collapsed, and Magnolia minutes away from being completely destroyed by the Thunder Palace, Erza and Natsu desperately search Magnolia to find Laxus and stop him. Waiting in Kardia Cathedral, Laxus is first visited by the mysterious and powerful Fairy Tail S class wizard, Mystogan. As they battle, Natsu and Erza show up, and Mystogan ends up showing his face to the one he least wanted to see... Will the strongest in Fairy Tail finally be decided this time? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: サタン降臨
Advent of Satan
L`avènement de Satan
A Chegada De Satã!
Satan Kourin
episode.summary: The Battle of Fairy Tail rages on as the newly revived female Fairy Tail wizards search for Laxus before the Thunder Palace activates and rains destruction down on Magnolia! Loke shows up in the nick of time to help Lucy in her battle with Bickslow, but Bickslow still has a few tricks up his sleeves! Meanwhile Cana and Juvia encounter Freed, but get caught in one of his rune traps and are forced to fight one another! Mirajane finds Elfman, seriously injured after his defeat by Evergreen, but when Elfman tries to join back in the fight, Freed shows him what happens to anyone who breaks his rules. Seeing her brother suffering so much, something long dormant awakens inside of Mirajane... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 運命の出会いの日
The Day of the Fateful Encounter
Une rencontre marquée par le destin
Enfim, Nos Encontramos!
Unmei no Deai no Hi
episode.summary: The Harvest Festival is over, and things at the guild have returned to normal... Well, normal for Fairy Tail, that is, since everyone is making a huge fuss over a reporter from the Weekly Sorcerer that`s coming to do a special report! At the same time, Cana tells Lucy this fortune "My cards tell me that today you will have a fateful encounter." Is Lucy`s love life going to get a jump start when two young men, the reporter for the magazine and a novelist, show up in front of her? Who could be Lucy`s fated partner!? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 六魔将軍[オラシオンセイス]現る!
Enter the Oracion Seis!
Oracion Seis entre en scène !
Oracion Seis Aparece!
Oracion Seis Arawaru!
episode.summary: Oracion Seis is trying to get their hands on a powerful magic sealed away by the ancients called "Nirvana." And in order to stop them, the allied forces are about to set their plan into action, but they`re already playing into the enemy`s hands! With their guard down, both Jura and Ichiya are out for the count, and even their supposed trump card, the magical bomber, crashes in flames right before Natsu`s eyes! Then, with no hesitation, all of Oracion Seis shows up right in front of everyone! It`s the Allied Forces verses the Six Wizard Generals! Wait, right off the bat? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 連合軍, 集結!
Allied Forces, Assemble!
Équipe de la coalition, parée !
Ergam-Se, Aliados!
Rengougun, Shuuketsu!
episode.summary: The most powerful force of the Dark Guilds is the "Baram Alliance"!! It looks like one of the key members, the Dark Guild Oracion Seis, has started making some seriously worrying moves. And to counter it, Fairy Tail is teaming up with three other official guilds to form their own alliance! All gathered up, the group has a bad-boy, a gigolo, a narcissist, and... a kid?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: LOVE&LUCKY
Love & Lucky
LOVE & LUCKY
Love & Lucky!
Love & Lucky
episode.summary: A suspicious shadow tails close behind Lucy... Why, it`s Lucy`s father, completely changed! His business and all his money were completely taken from him. Lucy ends up turning away her father when he desperately begs for money. But the trade guild that he is heading to in order to start over is attacked! "He may be that man... But even so, I have to save him!" Lucy goes to save the only father she`s got! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 特別依頼. 気になる彼に注意せよ!
Special Request: Watch Out for the Guy You Like!
Mission spéciale. Prends garde à l`être aimé
Missão Especial: Cuidado Com O Menino Que Gosta!
Tokubetsu Irai. Ki ni Naru Kare ni Chuui Seyo!
episode.summary: There`s more strange happenings at Fairy Tail! Mira says that Natsu might be in love with Lucy, which causes Lucy`s heart to race... At the same time, Juvia tries to fulfill her tender heart`s painful unrequited love for Gray by using a forbidden magic potion! But could this potion bring Fairy Tail to the brink of destruction?! Everyone`s making a giant fuss over love, but how will it all end? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 天空の巫女
Maiden of the Sky
La Prétresse Céleste
A Dama Dos Céus!
Tenkuu no Miko
episode.summary: Wendy is actually the Sky Dragon Slayer, and she can use Healing Magic! But she and Happy are taken away by Oracion Seis... Natsu and the rest follow them to get Wendy back, so she can save Erza from the poison she was hit with in the last battle, however Oracion Seis has their own plans to get Wendy to heal "that person who holds the key to Nirvana..." And you`ll never guess who that person is! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 闇
Darkness
Les ténèbres
Escuridão!
Yami
episode.summary: Erza`s life is saved thanks to Wendy`s Healing Magic! Natsu and the others are overjoyed, but just then, from the center of the Worth Woodsea, a pillar of black light rises up! Could that be Nirvana? Natsu doesn`t waste a single moment and dashes off toward the light. Meanwhile, the member of Oracion Seis known as Midnight is now awake. While the situation gets even more chaotic, the fearsome truth of Nirvana is revealed! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: デッドGP[グランプリ]
Dead Grand Prix
Le grand prix de la mort
GP Da Morte!
Dead Grand Prix
episode.summary: Natsu is heading back with Wendy, who holds the key to saving Erza, while Gray is facing off against one of the cornerstones of Oracion Seis, Racer! But things go beyond just his overwhelming speed, and heat up into an all-out magic motorcycle race, the Dead Grand Prix! Gray`s got guts taking on the enemy on his own turf, but then his old fellow pupil Lyon shows up. With the two them working in sync, can they find a way to steal his speed? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 少女と亡霊
The Girl and the Ghost
La fillette et le fantôme
A Menina E O Fantasma!
Shoujo to Bourei
episode.summary: The alliance hurries to rescue the captured Wendy, but a number of Dark Guilds are standing in their way! Somehow Natsu kicks the butts of the powerful foes in his way and reaches the place where Wendy and Happy are, but there he comes face to face with someone he could never have imagined encountering! Before him is Jellal, who was supposed to have been engulfed in Etherion and vanished at the Tower of Heaven! Jellal then leaves on his own... His appearance has turned everything willy-nilly! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 星霊合戦
Celestial Skirmish
Duel d`esprits
Espírito Vs Espírito!
Seirei Kassen
episode.summary: Nirvana... A fearsome magic that switches darkness and light! Lucy and Hibiki, who knows about this, hurry to chase after Natsu and Erza, but one of Oracion Seis, the Celestial Wizard Angel, stands in their way! Lucy can`t stand the way that Angel thinks of her Spirits as nothing more than tools. But before the more powerful Angel, Lucy is brought to her knees! Her back to the wall, facing defeat, Lucy`s feelings for her Spirits call forth something amazing... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 破滅の行進
March of Destruction
La marche de la destruction
Marcha Da Destruição!
Hametsu no Koshin
episode.summary: Jellal has cast a self-destruction magic circle on himself! He thought he would be able to destroy Nirvana that way. However, Brain of Oracion Seis suddenly appears, removes the self-destruction magic circle easily... and Nirvana is finally reborn! Nirvana, ruled by wickedness... Soon darkness will rise over the world... But everyone`s hopes are still connected! Natsu and the others refuse to give up, and challenge the darkness of Oracion Seis! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 追憶のジェラール
Jellal of Days Gone By
L’ancien Jellal
As Lembranças De Jellal!
Tsuioku no Gerard
episode.summary: "Jellal is alive..." Knowing the shocking truth, the revived Erza aims straight for Jellal. And then the two meet again... But the Jellal she knew isn`t the one that`s there! This Jellal is changed completely... What could be the reason why he unlocked Nirvana`s seal? And his shocking, heroic determination is... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 超空中戦! ナツvs. コブラ
Super Aerial Battle: Natsu vs. Cobra!
Un combat aérien : Natsu vs. Cobra !
Super Batalha Aérea! Natsu Vs Cobra!
Choukuuchuusen! Natsu vs. Cobra
episode.summary: Nirvana has been activated once again! In order to stop it, Natsu and Happy show up in front of Brain, but one of Oracion Seis, Cobra, stands in their way. Natsu and Happy vs. Cobra and his poison snake Cubellios in a giant mid-air battle! With all his attacks being "heard", nothing Natsu tries seems to work. But the shocking truth about Cobra may lead to the final blow! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 天馬から妖精たちへ
From Pegasus to Fairies
De la part de Pégase
Do Pégaso Para As Fadas!
Tenba kara Yousei-tachi e
episode.summary: Nirvana fired on Caitshelter! But, in the nick of time, Hibiki and the others appear in the magical bomber Christina, and block the attack. And furthermore, they know the way that Nirvana can be stopped! Hibiki tells everyone that the way to stop Nirvana is to destroy the lacrima in each of the six legs simultaneously. Everyone is covered in battle wounds, but they still haven`t given up hope! Can Natsu and the gang stop Zero`s evil ambitions? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ゼロ
Zero
Zéro
Zero!
Zero
episode.summary: Oracion Seis has been wiped out! Natsu and the Alliance have, after a fierce struggle, come out victorious... But, could it just be the beginning of an even greater life and death battle? Incredibly, when all six of Oracion Seis fall, they release the Body Link magic cast on Brain that seals away his alternate personality, the guild master of Oracion Seis, Zero! Zero loves destruction, and holds immense, evil magic power... With Caitshelter in sight, Natsu and the gang do battle with the most powerful foe they`ve ever faced! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 君の言葉こそ
Your Words
Tes paroles, plus que tout
Suas Palavras!
Kimi no Kotoba Koso
episode.summary: Erza and Jellal take on the final member of Oracion Seis, Midnight! But he`s so powerful he even defeats Jellal easily! Erza suffers under Midnight`s "Reflector" magic that is capable of bending and warping anything... Facing the most powerful member of Oracion Seis, can they find any chance for victory? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 聖十[せいてん]のジュラ
Wizard Saint Jura
Jéra, le mage sacré
Jura, O 10° Santo!
Seiten no Jura
episode.summary: Nirvana is an ultra inversion magic that switched light and darkness! And for some reason Brain from Oracion Seis is heading toward Wendy`s guild, Caitshelter, trying to destroy it! But standing against the evil Brain is Jura of Lamia Scale, and he`s seriously angry! Can the power of someone bestowed with the title of Wizard Saint defeat Brain and stop Nirvana?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: たった一人の為のギルド
A Guild for One
Une guilde fondée pour une personne
Uma Guilda Pelo Bem De Um Só!
Tatta Hitori no Tame no Guild
episode.summary: Even if you lose your memories, that does not absolve your sins... The aim of the Reformed Magic Council wasn`t just Oracion Seis, but to capture Jellal! Seeing Erza`s expression as she grapples with that reality, the rest of Fairy Tail springs into action to stop his arrest. What is Erza`s answer, as she watches over it all? Then, Wendy and the others return to the guild Caitshelter, where Master Robaul tells them the shocking truth. What is Caitshelter`s big secret?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 私がついている
I`m with You
Je suis avec toi
Conte Comigo!
Watashi ga Tsuite Iru
episode.summary: Natsu, with his true Dragon Slayer`s powers unleashed, finally crushes the lacrima and Master Zero! The rest of the lacrima are destroyed by his partners, and Nirvana thunderously crashes to the ground! With their victory secured, the alliance picks themselves back up. But, someone has set up runes, trapping Natsu and the others! The identity of the person who imprisoned them is the Captain of the Reformed Magic Council`s 4th Enforcement and Detention Corps. What does he want, after appearing out of the blue?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 想いの力
The Power of Feelings
La force des sentiments
O Poder Das Lembranças!
Omoi no Chikara
episode.summary: The Alliance heads out to stop Nirvana, even though they are bruised and battered to the point of barely being able to stand... Natsu uses his nose to pick the lacrima where the strongest enemy awaits him, Master Zero! Zero and Natsu are both rarin` for a fight, but Natsu has reached the limits of his magic power, and he`s in serious trouble. But then Jellal shows up, even though he should have headed to a different lacrima, and attacks Natsu with magic. Has Jellal fallen to the darkness yet again? What will Natsu do when his back`s against the wall? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 竜の誘い
Call of the Dragon
L`appel du dragon
O Chamado Do Dragão!
Ryuu no Izanai
episode.summary: Natsu and the others have returned to Fairy Tail after their long mission. The friendly, familial atmosphere heals all their fatigue from the fierce battles they had. Wendy and Carla join up, and the entire guild is in high spirits! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: フェアリーテイルの魔導士
A Fairy Tail Wizard
Les mages de Fairy Tail
Magos Da Fairy Tail!
Fairy Tail no Madoushi
episode.summary: Erza and the others hear Natsu cry out "Bust this thing up, and me along with it!" At the same time, the master hears the truth from Gray. Will Natsu`s power all be sucked into the Dragonoid? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 友は屍[しかばね]を越えて
Friendship Overcomes the Dead
L`amitié est plus forte que la mort
Amizade Que Supera A Morte!
Tomo wa Shikabane o Koete
episode.summary: Daphne`s goal was to capture Natsu, and use him to power her the artificial dragon she created through long years of research, the Dragonoid! The Dragonoid sucks out Natsu`s Dragon Slayer magic, but then... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ナツvs.グレイ!!
Natsu vs. Gray!!
Natsu vs.Grey !
Natsu Vs Gray!
Natsu vs. Gray!!
episode.summary: Natsu and the others came to the traveler`s inn Rise after getting info from Gray, but what was awaiting them there was a trap by Daphne, and now they can`t get out of the inn! And why did Gray...? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ウェンディ, 初めての大仕事!?
Wendy`s First Big Job!?
Première grande mission pour Wendy
A Primeira Missão De Wendy!?
Wendy, Hajimete no Ooshigoto!?
episode.summary: Wendy`s gotten used to doing jobs at Fairy Tail and wants to try taking on something bigger so she can be more help to everyone, but gets into an argument with Carla over it. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 虹[にじ]のさくら
Rainbow Cherry Blossoms
Le cerisier arc-en-ciel
Arco-Íris De Cerejeiras!
Niji no Sakura
episode.summary: Lucy is all excited for the big event that only comes once a year, the Fairy Tail hanami party! But before that she heads up Mt. Hakobe with Natsu and the gang for what she thought would be an easy request... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: エドラス
Edolas
Edolas
Edolas!
Edolas
episode.summary: Natsu and Happy, along with Wendy and Carla, are the only ones left after Fairy Tail, guild and all, is sucked into an alternate world named Edolas! What`s more, Carla seems to know something about what happened... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アースランド
Earth Land
Earthland
Face Da Terra!
Earthland

But the room is sealed with an anti-wizard barrier, and time is running out! Just then, Erza appears, but is it the Erza that brings hope, or despair?! Source: crunchyroll

Exhausted, outnumbered, and on unfamiliar turf, the Fairy Tail wizards have it tough... Is there anyone in Edolas willing to fight for the future of their own country? And what is the prince of Edolas, Mystogan, doing in the Anima Control Room? Source: crunchyroll

But Panther Lily can`t bring himself to go along with Jellal`s plan to sacrifice himself to make Lily as the new king... However the only way to calm the people is to set up a battle between a villain and a hero... Suddenly, a trio of evil-doers shows up wrecking havoc in the city, claiming to have stolen away Edolas`s magic power. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: オレはここに立っている

Ainda Estou De Pé!

But it just keeps sucking up more magic power and getting stronger! Can the Dragon Slayers work together and win? Meanwhile, Prince Jellal starts a giant Anima in reverse, sucking all magic power out of Edolas and into Earthland! Did he save the world only to destroy it? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 運がいいのは誰?

episode.summary: Things are back to normal around Fairy Tail and everyone is busy going about doing jobs... or actually, some people are working harder than ever before! The Master has some kind of big announcement to make and Lucy`s really curious what all the hubbub is about... It`s time for the once a year, S Class Wizard Advancement Exam! But who will the Master pick to be eligible to participate, and who will they pick as their partners? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 生命[いのち]を消す者

Celui qui anéantit la vie
Aquele Que Apaga Vidas!

episode.summary: Lead In: Natsu and company return to see the guild as lively as ever, with everyone celebrating Lisanna`s return. Meanwhile, in Edolas, Mystogan makes the first steps to rebuilding the kingdom and healing the wounds of the past... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: リサーナ

Carla still hasn`t forgiven them for the brainwashing and kill the Dragon Slayers mission they gave her, but perhaps there`s more to it than meets the eye? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: メスト

Mest
Mest!
Mest

episode.title: 鉄の魂
Iron Soul
L`âme d`acier
Alma De Ferro!

But just when they think they have him cornered, he keeps putting out some other crazy magic! How can they fight against someone who has the ability to turn anything he says into reality?! Meanwhile, Loke realizes the true nature of Caprico, and challenges him to a one-on-one battle! Source: crunchyroll

Zancrow proclaims himself to be a God Slayer, with control of flames that even Natsu can`t eat! Meanwhile, the rest of Fairy Tail is scattered and facing their own challengers. Is there any way for Natsu to win?! Source: crunchyroll

Will Juvia`s love for Gray give her the strength to win, or lead her to defeat? Source: crunchyroll

Lucy Fire

episode.title: 言えなかった一言

Ce que je n`ai pas pu lui dire

Meanwhile, Cana discovers Mavis`s grave, and the true reason for her striving so hard to become an S class wizard is revealed! But will it matter if everyone is crushed by Bluenote?! Source: crunchyroll

Au cœur de l’abysse

episode.summary: Despite using Laxus`s lightning power to its fullest, Natsu`s attacks continue to have no effect on Hades. Rather, Hades awakens the true depths of his magic power before the powerless Fairy Tail wizards, immobilizing them with fear. However, Natsu bolsters his friends with the same words of courage Gildarts had given them during the exam, and leads them in one final assault against Hades. Meanwhile, Happy, Charle, and Panther Lily stumble across a mechanical heart on the ship and try to destroy it.

episode.title: 紋章を刻まぬ男

L`homme sans la marque...
Homem sem Marca

episode.summary: Laxus furiously battles Hades to avenge Makarov. Their fight rages until Hades gravely injures Laxus, so he transfers his own lightning magic to Natsu and tells him to defeat Hades. Meanwhile, the rest of the uninjured Fairy Tail members defend their wounded master and friends from Kain Hikaru, Kawazu, and Yomazu.

episode.title: 雷鳴響く
Rolling Thunder
Le tonnerre gronde
Rugido do Trovão
Raimei Hibiku
episode.summary: Juvia chases Meredy as she carries Zeref before they run into Zancrow, who takes Zeref and cruelly reveals to Meredy that Ultear was responsible for destroying her home. Suddenly, Zeref awakens, utters the name "Acnologia", and unleashes a deadly wave of magic that kills Zancrow and knocks out Juvia and Meredy. Overhearing the commotion, Dranbalt warns the rest of the Magic Council troops, who retreat from the island. Meanwhile, Natsu, Lucy, Wendy, Happy, Carla, and Lily regroup with Gray and Erza. The exceeds infiltrate the Grimoire Heart airship to destroy its power source while the others take on Hades directly. Despite them fighting at full strength, Hades is unfazed by their attacks and prepares to kill Natsu, but is stopped by the timely arrival of Laxus.

episode.title: 生なる力
Power of Life
Le pouvoir de la vie
Poder Divino
Seinaru Chikara
episode.summary: It`s Ul`s pupil vs. Ul`s daughter! What is Ultear really after and why has she turned against her own flesh and blood? The final battle with the leader of the 7 Kin of Purgatory comes to its thrilling conclusion! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 凍える闘志
Freezing Fighting Spirit
Fureur glaçante
Alma de Gelo
Kogoeru Toushi
episode.summary: With Azuma defeated, all the Fairy Tail wizards get their magic power back! It`s comeback time on Tenroujima, and Gildarts, Fried, and Bickslow are going to show the remaining fighters from Grimoire Heart how stubborn Fairy Tail can be! Meanwhile, Ultear tells Gray the truth behind her actions, and begs him to defeat Hades and fulfill her mother`s dream... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: エルザvs.アズマ
Erza vs. Azuma
Erza contre Azuma
Erza vs. Azuma
