episode.summary: Azuma has felled the giant Tenrou Tree, and is stealing the magic power from all the Fairy Tail wizards on the island! He challenges Erza to a one-on-one duel, with the lives of all her fellow guild members hanging in the balance. Can Erza muster the power to protect her friends? Or does true strength come from something else? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 天狼樹
Tenrou Tree
L`arbre de Tenrô
A Árvore Tenrou!
Tenrou-ju
episode.summary: Gildarts and Bluenote square off, while Erza and Azuma face each other at the roots of the Tenrou Tree. But time is running out for Fairy Tail, as Master Hades had a trump card in his pocket the whole time! The battle of Tenroujima ventures into its final stages! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 暁の天狼島
Daybreak on Tenrou Island
Le jour se lève sur Tenrôjima
Amanhece em Tenroujima
Akatsuki no Tenroujima
episode.summary: The mechanical heart Happy and Charl destroy turns out to be giving Hades his power. Ultear uses her magic to return the Tenrou Tree to its original state, allowing Natsu, Lucy, Gray, Erza, Wendy, and Laxus to finally defeat the now powerless Hades. Makarov and the other injured guildmates return and order Grimoire Heart to leave Tenrou Island. As the Fairy Tail wizards celebrate and recover from their fight, Hades and the other defeated Grimoire Heart members discover Zeref on their ship.

episode.title: X791年・妖精の尻尾[フェアリーテイル]
Fairy Tail, Year X791
Fairy Tail, année X-791
Fairy Tail, ano X791
X791-nen Fairy Tail
episode.summary: With their strongest members gone for seven years, the Fairy Tail guild has become the weakest wizards` guild in Fiore, indebted to and bullied by Twilight Ogre, a new local guild. The remaining Fairy Tail members are visited by Ichiya and the Tri-men of Blue Pegasus, who tell them that they have recently discovered a change in the magical energy around the waters where Tenrou Island once stood. There they discover that the island was protected against Acnologia`s attack by the spirit of Mavis Vermilion, who used her power to help everyone on the island cast the defensive Fairy Sphere spell that inadvertently caused them to be frozen in time for seven years. The missing members return to their guild, drive the members of Twilight Ogre away, and reunite with their friends and Romeo is finally smiling after seeing Natsu, Lucy and the others again.

episode.title: 手をつなごう
Let`s Hold Hands
Donnons-nous la main
Mãos Dadas
Te o Tsunagou
episode.summary: Acnologia appears on Tenrou Island and begins destroying everything in sight. Makarov tries to hold Acnologia off for his guild to escape, but they refuse to let their master die and help him fight the dragon. Everyone holds hands with one another to try and cast a defensive spell against Acnologia`s breath attack, which seemingly obliterates the island. Seven years pass with the Fairy Tail members on the island missing and presumed dead.

episode.title: 愛する資格
The Right to Love
Le droit d`aimer
Direito de Amar
Ai Suru Shikaku
episode.summary: Zeref reveals to Hades that his power had never been sealed to begin with, making Grimoire Heart`s efforts to reawaken him pointless. Accusing Hades of summoning the dragon called Acnologia through his guild`s actions, Zeref kills him. Ultear, meanwhile, confesses to Meredy about destroying her hometown and tries to drown herself out of guilt, but Meredy rescues and forgives her. On Tenrou Island, Makarov postpones the S-Class exam because of the battle, and Cana finally tells Gildarts that she is his daughter. As this happens, Acnologia forebodingly flies towards Tenrou Island as Zeref watches in alarm.

episode.title: 空白の7年
The Seven Year Gap
Sept ans d’absence
O Lapso de Sete Anos
Kuuhaku no Shichi-nen
episode.summary: The members of Lamia Scale visit Fairy Tail as they celebrate their friends` return. Gray learns from Lyon what had happened to Ultear and Meredy over the past seven years, while Erza learns the same about Jellal. Makarov, Erza, and Mirajane later visit the Twilight Ogre guild and take revenge for being bullied by them. Meanwhile, Lucy is kicked out of her house for being unable to pay her rent for seven years. She decides to visit her father Jude, only to learn he had died one month before she and her friends returned from Tenrou Island. She is allowed to return to her house by her landlady, who reveals to her seven years worth of birthday presents and rent money from her father, who had also left a letter detailing his unwavering hope that she was alive. Realizing her father truly loved her, Lucy admits her own love for her father.

episode.title: 魔法舞踏会
The Magic Ball
Le bal de la magie
Baile Mágico
Mahou Butoukai
episode.summary: Natsu, Lucy, and their friends take a job to capture Velveno, an escaped convict with the power to transform into other people and mimic their magic, who plans to attend a ball held by the wealthy Count Balsamico for his daughter Aceto to find a husband. It is assumed by the count that Velveno is there to steal the valuable Balsamico family ring. The Fairy Tail members fail to capture him before he obtains the ring, but he instead uses it to propose to Aceto as he is in love with her. Aceto accepts his proposal on the condition that he turn himself in for his crimes, which he does, though it costs Fairy Tail their reward for the job.

episode.title: 計算をこえるもの
Defying Calculation
Au-delà des prévisions
Keisan o Koeru Mono
episode.summary: The Fairy Tail teams have located the scattered clock parts, but keeping them out of the hands of Legion is another thing entirely! Dan Straight chases Lucy around in one location while Panther Lily and Samuel have an Exceed-ingly ferocious battle in another. Meanwhile, Gajeel and Shadow Gear contend with a giant stone guardian below. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 真の悪, ふたたび

Le retour du diable en personne
Shin no Waru, Futatabi
episode.summary: They`re back by no one`s demand! The Jiggle Butt Gang is committing more fragrant fouls (or is that "foul fragrances") than ever before, which stinks because they`re doing it right in the faces of Erza and Wendy! Meanwhile, the only thing that can possibly break up the brawl between Natsu and Dan... is Lucy?! Oh, and... clock parts are finally discovered! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 神話の足跡

Shinwa no Ashiato
episode.summary: The Fairy Tail teams get ever closer to the clock parts, but two Legion members have already shown up to challenge Natsu`s team! And that means more size-changing shenanigans, deathtraps, and unlikely allies than you can throw a stick at! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 迷宮狂想曲

Meikyuu Kyousoukyoku

Meanwhile, in an interdimensional space, Gray, Juvia, and Lyon are in a desperate battle with Sugar Boy over the first piece of the mysterious clock! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 旅の仲間たち

Tabi no Nakama-tachi
episode.summary: It`s a race against time as the members of Fairy Tail split up into groups to find the scattered pieces of the mystical clock before Legion, but they run into all manner of obstacles. Nor does it help that Natsu is currently a doll-sized version of himself! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 星空の鍵
Key of the Starry Heavens

episode.summary: After Legion makes off with Lucy`s key, the only thing the members of Fairy Tail can do is search for clues to figure out Legion`s objective and the purpose of the memento from Lucy`s father. They head to Lucy`s old family mansion, but as soon as they discover a hint, two more Legionnaires crash the party... and one of them is an Exceed! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: レギオンの猛威

La fureur de la Légion
Legion no Moui
episode.summary: It`s Natsu versus Sugar Boy! Wendy and Lily versus Coco! Lucy versus Hughes! And Gildarts versus Byro! But are the members of Legion really after Lucy... or something else?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 狙われたルーシィ
Target: Lucy
Lucy est traquée

Nerawareta Lucy
episode.summary: The three visiting wizards, who turn out to be the Earthland counterparts of Hughes (a woman named Mary Hughes), Sugar Boy, and Coco, battle Fairy Tail and demand to hand Lucy over to them. Michelle passes herself off as Lucy to protect her, prompting the rest of the guild to confuse the three into thinking that all of the females at Fairy Tail are Lucy so she and Michelle can escape. However, Hughes chases the two and forces them off the edge of a cliff.

episode.title: 怒涛の対決! ナツvs.ラクサス
Turbulent Showdown! Natsu vs. Laxus
Natsu contre Luxus ! Le duel des enragés !
Batalha à vista! Natsu vs. Laxus!
Dotou no Taiketsu! Natsu vs. Laxus
episode.summary: Natsu and Gajeel challenge the still-exiled Laxus to a fight. Wendy suggests they have a showdown the next day in the hopes that they will calm down and lose interest, but it only excites the rest of the guild, who hold a festival for it. Almost as soon as their battle starts, however, Laxus beats Natsu with a single punch and Gajeel runs away in fear. While the rest of the town searches for Gajeel, the guild is visited by three figures resembling Hughes, Sugar Boy, and Coco from Edolas. Meanwhile, Lucy decodes the writing on the rod with Levy`s help and discovers that it is the hand of a legendary clock.

episode.title: 父の遺品
Father`s Memento
Le souvenir d`un père
Lembrança do Pai
Chichi no Ihin
episode.summary: Michelle, a girl claiming to be Lucy`s relative, visits Fairy Tail and gives Lucy a briefcase containing a large metallic rod, which she says is a memento from Lucy`s late father. Because Michelle is an orphan and has nowhere else to go, Lucy takes Michelle in and suggests she start working at Fairy Tail. While adjusting to life at the guild, Michelle suggests that Lucy send a request to investigate the key. After Michelle accidentally drops the rod, it levitates into the air and a set of glowing symbols appears upon it. Makarov becomes suspicious and warns Lucy not to involve herself with the rod any further, though Lucy remains determined to find out what her father asked of her.

episode.title: 透明ルーシィの恐怖!
The Terror of Invisible Lucy!
La frayeur de Lucy l`invisible
O Terror da Lucy Invisível!
Toumei Lucy no Kyoufu!
episode.summary: Lucy bathes with a magical lotion she created seven years ago, only to find that its effects have changed over the years to turn her entire body invisible. She turns to her friends for help, but their attempts to make her visible again by painting on her and masking her fail. Eventually the lotion`s effects become so severe that they cause Lucy to disappear together with everyone`s memories of her as if she had never existed. Fortunately, Natsu is able to remember his friendship with Lucy, allowing everyone to recall her back into existence. As Happy hugs Lucy in joy, however, she accidentally spills the lotion bottle over everyone else, turning all of them invisible.

episode.title: 真の悪ケツプリ団
True Scoundrels: The Butt Jiggle Gang
Ketsupuri, le gang des pures crapules
A Verdadeiramente Maléfica Gangue do Traseiro Ridículo
Shin no Waru Ketsupuri-dan
episode.summary: Natsu, Lucy, and Wendy keep watch over a gold-carrying train, which is hijacked by a trio of large-buttocked thieves called the Jiggle Butt Gang. The three use Natsu`s motion sickness to their advantage to get rid of Lucy, Happy, and Carla, leaving Wendy the only one able to defend the train`s cargo. She manages to impress them with her powers and tries to talk them out of their thieving ways, but once the train stops and Natsu recovers, Natsu sends them flying before she has a chance.

episode.title: 聖戦のゆくえ
The Course of the Holy War
Vers la guerre sainte !
Seisen no Yukue
episode.summary: Mary Hughes breaks a taboo by unleashing her ultimate power! Can Mirajane out-ultimate her? Plus, Natsu takes on a giant octopus! And... the debut of the Jiggle Jugs Gang?! (Warning: It`s not as appealing as it sounds...) Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 無限時計[むげんどけい]を追え!
Get the Infinity Clock!
À la poursuite de l’horloge infinie !
Mugendokei o Oe!
episode.summary: Oracion Seis has made off with the Infinity Clock and seems intent on counting down to doomsday. Meanwhile, Fairy Tail regroups, using Cana`s divination skills to locate Oracion Seis`s targets and choose the best teams to go after them! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新生六魔将軍[オラシオンセイス]現る!
Enter the Neo-Oracion Seis!
Voici Oracion Seis, nouvelle version !
Shinsei Oracion Seis Arawaru!
episode.summary: Just when it looks Fairy Tail is about to have a climactic fight with Byro over the Infinity Clock, Oracion Seis returns, with upgraded powers and a desire to make the ominous clock their own! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 動き始めた刻
Time Begins to Tick
Lancement du compte à rebours !
Ugoki Hajimeta Toki
episode.summary: Natsu gives all he`s got against a Legion of one: Byro Cracy, who has the power to nullify all magic! Will the other Fairy Tail groups get there in time to pitch in? Or will this be... the beginning of the end? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 戦いの不協和音
Dissonance of Battle
Désordres de bataille
Tatakai no Fukyouwaon
episode.summary: Doranbolt... or is that Mest Gryder?... returns! But whose side is he on this time? Meanwhile, teamwork isn`t working out for Natsu, Elfman, and Lucy against the threat of Jackpot! Likewise, new partners Erza and Evergreen just can`t get along! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アンチリンク
Anti-Link
Anti-Link
Anti-Link
episode.summary: Mest and Lahar meet the mystery person that Zentopia has been hiding... or is that hunting down? Gray and Fried face off against one of the Six Generals (and Dan Straight`s new object of adoration), Angel! Meanwhile, Erza, Evergreen, and Max are confounded by Cobra, master of sound! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 解き放たれた絶望
Despair Unleashed
Le désespoir libéré
Tokihanatareta Zetsubou
episode.summary: Oracion Seis`s true plan comes to light! Michelle Lobster isn`t who she seems to be! And for that matter, neither is Jackpot! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 天使の涙
Angel Tears
Les larmes d`un ange
Tenshi no Namida
episode.summary: In order to save Lucy, the last four members of the new Oracion Seis must be defeated! And one of them is Angel, whose powers seem more demonic than anything as she summons fearsome angels to destroy Gray. When the lovestruck Dan Straight intervenes, will he be a help or hindrance, and to whom?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 無限城へ!
To the Infinity Castle!
En route vers le château infini !
Mugen-jou e!
episode.summary: As Natsu and other Fairy Tail members race to save Lucy before she`s sacrificed by the new Oracion Seis, Gildarts has a non-magic showdown with Byro. They also learn the secret of Cardinal Rapowant, that even he didn`t know! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 時のスパイラル
Time Spiral
La spirale du temps !
Toki no Spiral
episode.summary: Cardinal Rapowant`s devious plans begin coming to fruition as time itself warps, affecting even the Fairy Tail members aboard Ichiya`s Christina. En route to rescue Natsu and Lucy, they become children, elderly, and even different species! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: リアルナイトメア
Real Nightmare
Le cauchemard réel
Real Nightmare
episode.summary: Natsu is imprisoned inside the Zentopia stronghold... along with the Jiggle Butt Gang! Back home, the Fairy Tail wizards are visited by a few members of the Archaeological Society, who shed some light on the Infinity Clock and what it does. Finally, Oracion Seis has Lucy and are going to use her as the final element to activate "Real Nightmare"! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ルーシィとミッシェル
Lucy and Michelle
Lucy et Michelle
Lucy to Michelle
episode.summary: Only Brain II is left standing between Natsu and Lucy, but he`s the most powerful of the Six Generals! Also, learn the secret history of Lucy and Michelle in this epic finale to the Key of the Starry Heavens arc! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 友の声が聴こえる
I Hear the Voice of My Friend
J`entends la voix de mes amis
Tomo no Koe ga Kikoeru
episode.summary: The battle to rescue Lucy from the Infinity Clock rages on, but it may be too late as Lucy becomes one with the clock! Plus, the climactic battle between Erza and Cobra! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: すれ違った時間の分だけ
For All the Time We Missed Each Other
Juste le temps de se croiser
Surechigatta Jikan no Bun dake
episode.summary: There are only five days left `til the Grand Magic Games begin, but Natsu and company still aren`t ready for it. But then they meet up with Crime Sorciere, a small, independent guild led by an old frenemy. The members of this newish guild promise to help Fairy Tail "power up" in exchange for a favor... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 星々の歌
Song of the Stars
La chanson des étoiles !
Hoshiboshi no Uta
episode.summary: Fairy Tail`s best is back, but to rock the Grand Magic Games, they`ve got to make up seven years worth of time in only 3 months! It`s time for some seriously hard training! But before that, a little party in the Spirit World can`t hurt, right? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: そしてオレたちは頂上を目指す
And So We Aim for the Top
Nous, on vise le top !
Soshite Oretachi wa Choujou o Mezasu
episode.summary: When Natsu and some others from the "Tenrou group" visit apothecary hermit Poluchka to see if they can get some medicine to become stronger, Wendy senses something extremely familiar about the misanthropic old woman. Also, the next master of Fairy Tail is chosen (for real) and another important decision is made that could elevate the guild`s dismal reputation! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 剣咬の虎[セイバートゥース]
Sabertooth
Sabertooth
Sabertooth
episode.summary: Legion pays Fairy Tail a special visit! Fairy Tail learns of Sabertooth, the number one guild in Fiore! And what lies beneath the original Fairy Tail base of operations?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 花咲く都・クロッカス
Crocus, the Flower-Blooming Capital
Crocus, la cité fleurie
Hanasaku Miyako: Crocus
episode.summary: Five members of Fairy Tail are selected to participate in the Grand Magic Games. They make their way to Crocus, the capital of Fiore, where their rivals are gathering, too. As pre-Games tensions abound, Erza has a sneaking suspicion about the whole setup... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 空中迷宮[スカイラビリンス]
Sky Labyrinth
Sky Labyrinth
Sky Labyrinth
episode.summary: In the elimination round, Natsu and the others have to make their way through the Sky Labyrinth, a giant mind-bending maze full of rotating walls and vicious rivals! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ルーシィvs.フレア
Lucy vs. Flare
Lucy contre Flare
Lucy vs. Flare
episode.summary: In the first battle of the first day of the Magic Games, Lucy is pitted against Raven Tail`s Flare, whose long locks are deadly. But when Flare doesn`t play fair, Lucy is forced to grin and bear it or risk a friend getting hurt! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 星降ル夜ニ
Night of Shooting Stars
Pluie d`étoiles
Hoshi Furu Yoru ni
episode.summary: It`s "Hidden", the opening game of the Grand Magic Games, and Gray finds that it`s like playing cat and mouse. Unfortunately, he`s the "mouse" as he keeps getting picked off by a member of Raven Tail! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新規ギルド
New Guild
Nouvelle guilde
Shinki Guild
episode.summary: The eight participating guilds of the Grand Magic Games are introduced! Along with Fairy Tail, there are old friends and rivals, old and new enemies... and at least one team that`s completely unexpected! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: エルフマンvs.バッカス
Elfman vs. Bacchus
Elfman contre Bacchus
Elfman vs. Bacchus
episode.summary: In the ring, Elfman is forced to face Bacchus, a "drunken fighter" considered to be Erza`s equal! Meanwhile, Natsu wakes up in the infirmary to discover that Wendy and Carla have been kidnapped! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 戦車[チャリオット]
Chariots
Chariot
Chariot
episode.summary: The second day begins with a chariot race of a sort, obviously not the best event for Natsu as his motion sickness kicks in right away! Surprisingly, though, he`s not alone as two more participants suffer from the same affliction! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 凶瑞
Portent
Mauvais présage
Kyouzui
episode.summary: There are more one-on-one battles on the first day of the Grand Magic Games, culminating with the mysterious "Mystogan" versus Jura! Will a Fairy Tail team finally get points?! Or will Mystogan`s real identity be revealed, blowing his secret mission?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ミラジェーンvs.ジェニー
Mirajane vs. Jenny
Mirajane contre Jenny
Mirajane vs. Jenny
episode.summary: The second day of the Grand Magic Games continues, with Mirajane of Fairy Tail Team B fighting against Jenny Realight of Team Blue Pegasus.

episode.title: 伏魔殿[パンデモニウム]
Pandemonium
Pandémonium
Pandemonium
episode.summary: After Natsu punches out Dobengal, the guild member summoned to fight him, he and Jiemma engage in a duel. However, the guild master`s daughter Minerva appears, ends their duel and, taking Happy hostage, convinces Natsu to settle their dispute in the Grand Magic Games.

episode.title: 怨みは夜の帳に包まれて
Hatred at Nightfall
La rancœur enveloppée dans les voiles de la nuit
Urami wa Yoru no Tobari ni Tsutsumarete
episode.summary: After Yukino is expelled from Sabertooth, she offers to relinquish her two Golden Gatekeys to Lucy to complete the latter`s collection of the Zodiac Gatekeys.

episode.title: カグラvs.ユキノ
Kagura vs. Yukino
Kagura contre Yukino
Kagura vs. Yukino
episode.summary: Yukino is revealed to be a Celestial Spirit wizard when she summons Libra and Pisces to attack Kagura.

episode.title: 小さな拳
Small Fists
Les petits poings
Chiisana Kobushi
episode.summary: With Cheria being fully healed and Wendy being almost depleted of magic power, their battle continues, with the former casting a high-level spell towards the latter. However, it seems that Wendy enhances Cheria`s physical strength, causing the attack to gain much force and thus missing Wendy.

episode.title: ウェンディ vs. シェリア
Wendy vs. Shelia
Wendy contre Shelia
Wendy vs. Cheria
episode.summary: After Laxus defeats Ivan and the four Raven Tail elite members, Ivan`s illusions disappear to the shock of everyone in the stadium. The game officials declare Laxus the victor, and Ivan tells him that Lumen Histoire is Fairy Tail’s `darkness`.

episode.title: ラクサスvs.アレクセイ
Laxus vs. Alexei
Luxus contre Alexei
Laxus vs. Alexei
episode.summary: In the battle portion of the Grand Magic Games` third day, Milliana of Mermaid Heel beats Semmes of Quatro Puppy while Sabertooth`s Rufus swiftly defeats Blue Pegasus` Eve. For the third match, Laxus of Fairy Tail Team B is chosen to battle against Alexei of Team Raven Tail.

episode.title: 100対1
100 Against 1
100 contre 1
100 tai 1
episode.summary: Erza kills the 100 monsters using various types of armor to match their strength and weaknesses. As a result, the crowd praises Fairy Tail, and the guild is awarded with 10 points.

episode.title: 君に捧げる香り[パルファム]
A Parfum for You
Le parfume que je te dédie
Kimi ni Sasageru Parfum
episode.summary: While Lucy is hospitalized and taken to the infirmary, the Fairy Tail members warn Sabertooth that they have angered the worst possible guild to do so.

episode.title: 海戦[ナバルバトル]
Naval Battle
Bataille navale
Naval Battle
episode.summary: As the jubilant Fairy Tail members celebrate their victories, the other people, such as Sting, Kagura, and Milliana, are contemplating on their own concerns, while Yukino is enlisted as a sergeant under Arcadios` command.

episode.title: ナツvs.双竜
Natsu vs. the Twin Dragons
Natsu contre les dragons jumeaux
Natsu vs. Souryuu
episode.summary: The tag battle of the Dragon Slayers comes to a close, with Natsu intrepidly overpowering the combined attacks of Sting and Rogue. The Sabertooth members watch in dismay, whilst Jiemma seethes in anger over the defeat of the Twin Dragons, causing the nearby spectators to be frightened away.

episode.title: 四人の竜[ドラゴン]
Four Dragons
Quatre dragons
Yonin no Dragon
episode.summary: The tag battle continues, with Sting and Rogue beginning to attack Natsu and Gajeel with their powers being increased.

episode.title: バトル・オブ・ドラゴンスレイヤー
Battle of Dragon Slayers!
La bataille des chasseurs de dragons
Battle of the Dragon Slayers
episode.summary: Mermaid Heel`s Kagura and Milliana and Lamia Scale`s Lyon and Yuka face off for the second tag battle of the games.
